statements: DELETE FROM product_recommendations WHERE customer_id = 100 AND preference_score < 0.5;
DELETE FROM product_recommendations WHERE customer_id = 200 AND product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics');
DELETE FROM product_recommendations WHERE customer_id = (SELECT customer_id FROM customers WHERE name = 'John') AND preference_score < 0.2;
DELETE FROM product_preferences WHERE customer_id = 123 AND product_id = 456;
DELETE FROM recommended_products WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM product_preferences WHERE preference_score < 0.5);
DELETE FROM recommended_products WHERE product_id = (SELECT recommended_product_id FROM recommended_products WHERE product_id = 789);
DELETE FROM customers WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female';
DELETE FROM products WHERE price < 50.00 AND category = 'Electronics';
DELETE FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preference_category = 'Clothing' AND preference_value = 'Shoes';
